飛也似的.definition: lit. as if flying; very fast

飛來飛去.definition: to fly about; to fly hither and thither; to flit; to swarm; to spiral

飛刀.definition: a throwing knife; fly cutter (machine tool)

飛升.definition: to fly upwards; (fig.) to rise; to increase; (Daoism) to ascend to heaven; to achieve immortality

飛地.definition: administrative enclave; land of one country enclosed within another; a salient

飛奔.definition: to dash (run fast); to rush; to dart

飛將軍.definition: nickname of Han dynasty general Li Guang 李廣|李广[Li3 Guang3]

飛快.definition: very fast; at lightning speed; (coll.) razor-sharp

飛揚跋扈.definition: bossy and domineering; throwing one's weight about

飛撾.definition: ancient weapon with a tip like a grappling hook, thrown at enemy combatants in order to capture them

飛散.definition: (of smoke) to disperse; to dissipate; (of birds) to fly away in all directions

飛檐走壁.definition: to leap onto roofs and vault over walls (usually associated with martial arts)

飛檢.definition: unannounced inspection (abbr. for 飛行檢查|飞行检查[fei1xing2 jian3cha2])

飛沫傳染.definition: droplet infection (disease transmission from sneezing, coughing etc)

飛符.definition: talisman in the form of a painting of symbols thought to have magical powers (also called 符籙|符箓[fu2 lu4]); to invoke the magical power of such a talisman; a tiger tally 虎符[hu3 fu2] sent with great urgency

飛翔.definition: to circle in the air; to soar

飛舞.definition: to flutter; to dance in the breeze

飛虎隊.definition: Flying Tigers, US airmen in China during World War Two; Hong Kong nickname for police special duties unit

飛蚊症.definition: eye floaters (moving spots in the eye's vitreous humor)

飛蛾投火.definition: lit. like a moth flying into the fire (idiom); fig. to choose a path to certain destruction

飛蛾撲火.definition: the moth flies into the flame; fatal attraction

飛行.definition: (of planes etc) to fly; flying; flight; aviation

飛行器.definition: flying craft (airplane, drone, missile, balloon, spacecraft, satellite etc)

飛行檢查.definition: unannounced inspection; (sports) out-of-season drug testing; abbr. to 飛檢|飞检[fei1 jian3]

飛賊.definition: cat burglar; burglar who gains entrance by scaling walls; intruding enemy airman; air marauder

飛越.definition: to fly across; to fly over; to fly past; (literary) (of one's spirits) to soar

飛跑.definition: to run like the wind; to rush; to gallop

飛身.definition: to move quickly; to vault; flying tackle

飛車.definition: fast-moving vehicle; to drive or ride a vehicle at high speed

飛輪.definition: flywheel; freewheel; cassette (of a bicycle); fast-moving bike

飛轉.definition: to spin rapidly; to whirl around; (of time) to fly by

飛逝.definition: (of time) to pass quickly; to be fleeting

飛過.definition: to fly over; to fly past

飛針走線.definition: flying needle and running seam (idiom); skillful needlework

飛鏢.definition: darts (game); dart (weapon shaped like a spearhead)

飛騰.definition: to fly swiftly upward; to soar

飛魚族.definition: "flying fish family", family who sacrifice everything to send their children abroad to study

飛鳥時代.definition: Asuka Period in Japanese history (538-710 AD)

飛鴻踏雪.definition: see 雪泥鴻爪|雪泥鸿爪[xue3 ni2 hong2 zhao3]

飛鴻雪爪.definition: see 雪泥鴻爪|雪泥鸿爪[xue3 ni2 hong2 zhao3]

飛鴿.definition: Flying Pigeon (famous bicycle brand, made in Tianjin since 1936)

飛鷹走馬.definition: to ride out hawking (idiom); to hunt

飛黃騰達.definition: lit. the divine steed Feihuang gallops (idiom); fig. to achieve meteoric success in one's career
